entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 50 gusting to 70 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill minus 44 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
